SELECT jd.dbCode, jd.hospitalId, jd.patientId, jd.dName, jd.dCode, jd.dDate, jd.pDoctor, jd.adminId, jd.drDate , ym.mbCode, ym.mmName, ym.mmCode, ym.miName, ym.miCode, ym.mVolume, ym.mdUnit, ym.mdNumber, ym.mPeriod, ym.mUsage, ym.mdTime, ym.mrDate , gc.strCode, gc.stiName, gc.stiCode, gc.stName, gc.strValue, gc.strrValue, gc.stdTime, gc.strDate , br.ptrCode, br.ptName, br.ptCode, br.ptrValue, br.ptdTime, br.ptrDate , ys.itrCode, ys.itName, ys.itCode, ys.itrValue, ys.itdTime, ys.itrDate , pd.iidCode, pd.liContent, pd.iUrl, pd.idName, pd.ifdTime, pd.iliDate, pd.iidrDate , gn.ftrCode, gn.ftName, gn.ftCode, gn.ftrValue, gn.ftdTime, gn.ftrDate , ss.sbCode, ss.sName, ss.sCode, ss.aKind, ss.sdTime, ss.sbDate , alg.aseCode, alg.asemFactor, alg.asemfCode, alg.aseName, alg.aseReaction, alg.asedTime, alg.aserDate , yb.pibCode, yb.piName, yb.piCode, yb.pivName, yb.piBalance, yb.piDate, yb.pirDate , sc.vscCode, sc.vscHeight, sc.vscWeight, sc.bpMin, sc.bpMax, sc.bheat, sc.vscCheck, sc.vscrDate , smk.scCode, smk.sccName, smk.scrDate , drk.dcCode, drk.dccName, drk.dcrDate , jy.lcidCode, jy.lcidName, jy.lcidpGroup, jy.lcidtResult, jy.lcidinOut, jy.lcidArea, jy.lcidoDate, jy.lciddDate, jy.lcidrDate, jy.lcidDate FROM jindan jd JOIN yakmul ym JOIN gumche gc JOIN byungri br JOIN youngsang ys JOIN pandog pd JOIN ginueng gn JOIN susul ss JOIN allergy alg JOIN yebang yb JOIN saengchae sc JOIN smoking smk JOIN drinking drk JOIN junyum jy
